messages.1000096332: Restores the HP of all allies including yourself.\n#yHealing Skill\nHeals {0}% of max HP
messages.1000072308: Constantly generates an electrical field near the Lightning Relic.\n#yElectrical Field Damage: {0}% of Magic Damage
messages.1000092301: Summons lightning bolts to strike enemies within {0}m of your relics.\n#yMagic Damage per Relic: {1}%
messages.1000072298: Increases the healing range of Healing Relic and decreases all incoming damage for {0} sec.\n#yDamage Taken: -{1}%\nHealing Range: {2}m
messages.1000072302: Enhances Cure Relic's range. Cures you of status effects when casted and knocks back enemies.
messages.1000072450: Increases Bind Relic's range and the amount of damage dealt to nearby enemies.\n#yArea Damage: +{0}%
messages.1000059824: Increases Movement Speed after using a relic skill.\n#yDuration: {0} sec\nMovement Speed +{1}%
messages.1000077111: Enhances Relic Reaction. Lightning bolts deal damage 2 times. No change in Damage per bolt.
messages.1000093715: #yHoly Shield#w restores MP for {1} sec at a rate of {0}% every {2} sec.\n\n#yMagic Damage: +{2}%
messages.1000090382: Greatly increases the max HP rate of the summoner when applied to a relic. Also decreases the damage that a relic receives and constantly generates an electric field near the Lightning Relic.\n#yElectrical Field Damage: {0}% of Magic Damage
messages.1000096349: Greatly increases the max HP rate of the summoner when applied to a relic. Decreases damage taken by relic, increases effective range, and restores a set amount of allies' MP.\n#yRecovery Range: {0}m\n#yRestores {1}% of max MP
messages.1000090384: Greatly increases the max HP rate of the summoner when applied to a relic. Also decreases the damage that a relic receives. Increases Movement Speed while the skill is active, and increases range. Cures you of status effects when cast and knocks back nearby enemies.\n#yMovement Speed: +{0}%
messages.1000090385: Greatly increases the max HP rate of the summoner when applied to a relic. Also decreases the damage that a relic receives and increases damage dealt to nearby enemies while increasing range.\n#yDamage dealt to nearby enemies: +{0}%
messages.1000093933:
#yEnhances Blessing of Strikes.
#wIf a Lightning Relic EX is placed nearby, you can summon a small relic using the regular attack button after casting Blessing of Strikes.  The small relic will deal damage that's {0}x the total damage of the Lightning Relic EX to surrounding areas.

#yEnhanced Relic Skill
#wMovement Speed increases when you use Relic-type Skills.
#yMovement Speed +{1}% 
Duration {2} sec
messages.1000076726: Enhances Relic Reaction. Lightning bolts deal damage 3 times. No change in Damage per bolt.
